channel.title: Comments on: SSRS Properties – NoRowsMessage
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Rohan
item.dc:creator: Rohan
item.description:
I want to set the No Row Message for Group of Tablix , It is possible of not with SSRS 2008
Thank You
item.content:encoded:
I want to set the No Row Message for Group of Tablix , It is possible of not with SSRS 2008

Thank You

item.title: By: Jes Borland
item.dc:creator: Jes Borland
item.description: This NoRowsMessage property is for a table or matrix, not the report - so you'll want it to say "Tablix".
item.content:encoded: This NoRowsMessage property is for a table or matrix, not the report – so you’ll want it to say “Tablix”.

item.title: By: Errol
item.dc:creator: Errol
item.description:
For the life of me I cannot find where in the properties window the "NoRowsMessage" property resides. I clicked on the report itself such that the top of the properties window shows "Report" instead of when you click on a textbox and the top of the properties window shows "textbox", yet I still cannot find property.
Can you shed some insight?
Thanks
item.content:encoded:
For the life of me I cannot find where in the properties window the “NoRowsMessage” property resides. I clicked on the report itself such that the top of the properties window shows “Report” instead of when you click on a textbox and the top of the properties window shows “textbox”, yet I still cannot find property.

Can you shed some insight?

Thanks
